Statute.Title: Public Sector Equitable Compensation Act
Statute.OtherLangTitle: (Équité dans la rémunération du secteur public, Loi sur l’)

Repeal.Text: [ACT REPEALED, 2018, c. 27, s. 429 — Not in force]

Transitional.Text: Transitional, 2009, c. 2, ss. 394 (ss. 47 to 50), 395 to 397 and 398 (application)

CIF.Text: CIF, 2009, c. 2, s. 394 (ss. 1 to 51) comes into force on a day to be fixed by order of the Governor in Council see s. 406 — Not in force [s. 394, repealed before coming into force see 2018, c. 27, s. 429 — Not in force]

Item.Text: — s. 395, repealed, see 2018, c. 27, s. 430 — Not in force
— s. 396, repealed, see 2018, c. 27, s. 431(4) — Not in force
— ss. 397 and 398, repealed, see 2018, c. 27, s. 432 — Not in force

CIF.Text: CIF, 2013, c. 40, ss. 361 and 362 in force on assent 12.12.2013; ss. 441 to 445 in force 01.11.2014 see SI/2014-84.
CIF, 2017, c. 9, ss. 50 to 53, par. 55(1)(q) and 57(1)(d) in force on assent 19.06.2017.
CIF, 2018, c. 24, ss. 28 and 29 in force on assent 26.11.2018
CIF, 2018, c. 27, ss. 429, 430, 431(4) and 432 come into force on a day or days to be fixed by order of the Governor in Council see s. 440(3) — Not in force
